videos.headline: Al Horford somehow gets the and-1 to fall

videos.description: Jaren Jackson Jr. stops Jayson Tatum's dunk attempt early in the first quarter with an emphatic block.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Jaren Jackson absolutely stuffs Jayson Tatum at the rim) 2022/03/04 ESHEET

videos.headline: Jaren Jackson absolutely stuffs Jayson Tatum at the rim

videos.description: Ja Morant throws down the unbelievable alley-oop with just his left hand as the TNT announcers can't believe what they saw.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Ja Morant leaps out of nowhere to throw down ridiculous jam) 2022/03/04 ESHEET

videos.headline: Ja Morant leaps out of nowhere to throw down ridiculous jam

videos.description: Jayson Tatum scores in the paint as the Celtics are taking it to the Grizzlies.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Jayson Tatum finishes through traffic as Celtics extend lead) 2022/03/04 ESHEET

videos.headline: Jayson Tatum finishes through traffic as Celtics extend lead

videos.description: Jayson Tatum drops 37 points on his birthday, including 21 points in the fourth quarter, as the Celtics take care of business vs. the Grizzlies.

tracking.trackingName: COM_NBA Highlight (Tatum leads Celtics to win over Grizzlies on his birthday) 2022/03/04 ESHEET SOTFULL

videos.headline: Tatum leads Celtics to win over Grizzlies on his birthday
